data.eml:eml: Description of three new Tetranchyroderma gastrotrichs (Macrodasyida: Thaumastodermatidae) from South Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Jimin, Kim, Dongsung, Chang, Cheon Young (2013): Description of three new Tetranchyroderma gastrotrichs (Macrodasyida: Thaumastodermatidae) from South Korea. Zootaxa 3709 (5): 483-493, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3709.5.6
